videographerText: All of your amazing performances will be filmed and photographed by one of the best Bellydance videographers with over 10 years of experience – Vladimir Kluchenkov — and our photographers team. <0>Videos and photos of all performances will be given to all participants for FREE</0>. Do not miss the opportunity to get high-quality videos and photos of your performances from one of the best stages for Bellydance in the world!
